      • getInstance

        static RamDiskReplicaTracker getInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                FsDatasetImpl fsDataset)
        Get an instance of the configured RamDiskReplicaTracker based on the the configuration property DFSConfigKeys.DFS_DATANODE_RAM_DISK_REPLICA_TRACKER_KEY.
        Parameters:
        conf - the configuration to be used
        dataset - the FsDataset object.
        Returns:
        an instance of RamDiskReplicaTracker

      • addReplica

        abstract void addReplica(String bpid,
              long blockId,
              FsVolumeImpl transientVolume)
        Start tracking a new finalized replica on RAM disk.
        Parameters:
        transientVolume - RAM disk volume that stores the replica.

      • touch

        abstract void touch(String bpid,
         long blockId)
        Invoked when a replica is opened by a client. This may be used as a heuristic by the eviction scheme.

      • dequeueNextReplicaToPersist

        abstract RamDiskReplicaTracker.RamDiskReplica dequeueNextReplicaToPersist()
        Get the next replica to write to persistent storage.

      • reenqueueReplicaNotPersisted

        abstract void reenqueueReplicaNotPersisted(RamDiskReplicaTracker.RamDiskReplica ramDiskReplica)
        Invoked if a replica that was previously dequeued for persistence could not be successfully persisted. Add it back so it can be retried later.

      • recordStartLazyPersist

      • recordEndLazyPersist

        abstract void recordEndLazyPersist(String bpid,
                        long blockId,
                        File[] savedFiles)
        Invoked when the Lazy persist operation is complete.
        Parameters:
        savedFiles - The saved meta and block files, in that order.

      • getNextCandidateForEviction

        abstract RamDiskReplicaTracker.RamDiskReplica getNextCandidateForEviction()
        Return a candidate replica to remove from RAM Disk. The exact replica to be returned may depend on the eviction scheme utilized.
        Returns:

      • numReplicasNotPersisted

        abstract int numReplicasNotPersisted()
        Return the number of replicas pending persistence to disk.
